titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4635) to amend title 49, United States Code, to establish a program for Federal flight deck officers, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-557, by Mr. Reynolds.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill (H. Rept. 107-555, Pt.1).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 185.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 472.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/9/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 4635 (arming pilots against terrorism).
